content: Shengkun Wu is a third-year undergraduate student at School of Electrical Engineering, Tongling University. Now he has a keen interest in image segmentation.
summary: Shengkun Wu is a third-year undergraduate student at School of Electrical Engineering, Tongling University. Now he has a keen interest in image segmentation.
title: Shengkun Wu

content: Feixiang Du is faculty at School of Electrical Engineering, Tongling University. Feixiang Du obtained the M.S. degree from Taiyuan University of Technology in 2018. Currently, Feixiang Du is leading the IntelliPupil Microvision Artificial Intelligence Laboratory and exploring how to understand and interact with the world via the computer vision. His research interests include Object Detection, Image Segmentation and Hyperspectral Reconstruction.
summary: Feixiang Du is faculty at School of Electrical Engineering, Tongling University. Feixiang Du obtained the M.S. degree from Taiyuan University of Technology in 2018. title: Feixiang Du

summary: In this work, we introduce a novel task called Reference Audio-Visual Segmentation (Ref-AVS), which seeks to segment objects within the visual domain based on expressions containing multimodal cues.
title: Refer and Segment Objects in Audio-Visual Scenes (Ref-AVS) Dataset
A Two-Stage Framework for Multiple Sound-Source Localization
